queries.query: SELECT id, login, password FROM users
SELECT id, login, password FROM users WHERE id = ${id}
SELECT shares.id, shares.path, shares.name, shares.access FROM users INNER JOIN user_share on users.id = user_share.id_user INNER JOIN shares on shares.id = user_share.id_share WHERE users.id = ${id}
UPDATE users SET login = '${login}', password = '${password}' WHERE id = ${id}
